com.seaglasslookandfeel.effect
Class SeaGlassInternalShadowEffect

java.lang.Object
  com.seaglasslookandfeel.effect.SeaGlassInternalShadowEffect

public class SeaGlassInternalShadowEffect
extends Object

Effect to fill an internal shadow, e.g. in a text component or a progress bar.

Author:
Kathryn Huxtable

Method Detail

fill

public void fill(Graphics2D g,
                 Shape s,
                 boolean isRounded,
                 boolean paintRightShadow)
Fill the shape with the internal shadow.

Parameters:
g - the Graphics context to paint with.
s - the shape to fill. This is only used for its bounds.
isRounded - true if the shape is rounded, false if it is rectangular.
paintRightShadow - true if the shape is rectangular and the rightmost shadow should be painted, false otherwise.

getRoundedShadowGradient

public Paint getRoundedShadowGradient(Shape s)
Create the gradient for a rounded shadow.

Parameters:
s - the shape of the gradient. This is only used for its bounds.
Returns:
the gradient.
